title: NATIONAL CONSENSUS SURVEYS
instructions: Please take a few minutes to go through the advertisements in this book. Please take as much time with each ad as you care to. If you ordinarily wear reading glasses, you'll need them.

questions.text: What brands or products do you remember seeing ads for in the book?
questions.note: DO NOT READ EITHER BRAND NAMES OR PRODUCT CATEGORIES.

questions.text: Do you remember any ads for cigarettes?
questions.note: IF NO CIGARETTE BRANDS MENTIONED ABOVE ASK:
questions.probe: What brands do you remember? Any others?

questions.text: Do you remember any ads for any other brands of cigarettes?
questions.note: IF ONE OR TWO CIGARETTE BRANDS MENTIONED ASK
questions.probe: What brands were they? Any others?

skip_instructions: IF NO CIGARETTE BRANDS MENTIONED ABOVE ASK Q.3a.
IF ONLY ONE OR TWO CIGARETTE BRANDS MENTIONED, SKIP TO Q.3b.
IF ALL THREE CIGARETTE BRANDS MENTIONED SKIP TO Q.4.
IF TRUE KENT MENTIONED IN Q.2, 3a OR 3b CONTINUE.
IF TRUE NOT MENTIONED IN Q.2, 3a OR 3b SKIP TO Q.10.
